content:
Categorize each of the following items as either a store-bought item or a handmade item.
(1) Candle holder (2) iPhone case (3) Drawer organizer

Each of the items can fall into either category depending on how they were acquired or made. However, based on general assumptions:

1. Candle holder - It could be either store-bought or handmade. Candle holders are commonly available in stores, but they are also popular DIY or handcrafted items.
2. iPhone case - Typically, this is a store-bought item. Most iPhone cases are mass-produced and sold in stores, although handmade cases can also be crafted by artisans.
3. Drawer organizer - Like candle holders, drawer organizers can be both store-bought or handmade. They are widely available in stores, but custom or DIY versions are also common.

Ultimately, the categorization depends on the specific source of each item.
